articles.author: Liam Croft
articles.title: The Last of Us on PC Attracts 'Mostly Negative' Reviews for Crashes, Poor Performance - Push Square
articles.content: The launch of The Last of Us: Part I on PC has not gone as smoothly as Naughty Dog would have been hoping as the port has garnered "mostly negative" reviews on Steam. This is due to constant crashes … [+1759 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Damaged Russian Soyuz Capsule Returns to Earth — Roscosmos - The Moscow Times
articles.description: A Russian unmanned Soyuz MS-22 capsule returned to Earth on Tuesday from the International Space Station (ISS), landing in Kazakhstan three months after experiencing a coolant leak.
articles.content:
A Russian unmanned Soyuz MS-22 capsule returned to Earth on Tuesday from the International Space Station (ISS), landing in Kazakhstan three months after experiencing a coolant leak.
